Text:
Dear Nepotu,

Long time no speak - still not able to download games but just wanted to say hello... I haven't watch any NBA or NCAA games so far :-( but i can see your work is still amazing... One day i will get back on line and enjoy your dedication and passion for sports... You take care man and we speak soon........... A bient么t!!!
Bon jour, mon ami francais! :) Thank you for your nice words. Really I enjoyed your comment. Cheers to France!
